posts.title: STICKY: Forumo taisyklės!
posts.question:
For evrybody whos new here - Labas! Here are forum rules: 1. Seriousness is strictly prohibited, unless you're a penguin. 
 2. The Pun Police: Excessive puns are allowed, but offenders must suffer through a mandatory 15-minute "pun"-ishment session. May the wordplay be with you!

3. Dress Code: All forum members must wear a silly hat while typing. Failure to comply will result in the automatic substitution of all your words with "banana."

4. Unicorn Appreciation Hour: Every day at 3 PM, everyone is required to share their favorite unicorn-related meme. Magical sparkles are highly encouraged.

5. Dance-Off Challenge: Forum disputes shall be resolved through epic dance-offs. Winners shall be awarded with eternal glory, and losers must admit defeat with a graceful twirl.

answers.content: Pabandykit nesilaikyti taisyklių ir pamatysit kas bus.

posts.title: Funkcionalumai?
posts.question: Gal kas matėt funkcionalumus? Pasileidau app'ą šį ryt, per naktį puse dingo?

answers.content: Ištrink node_module folderį ir pervadink visus .js ir .jsx failus i .txt formatą.. Turėtų išsispręsti..

posts.title: Kur čia vakarėlis?
posts.question: Girdėjau vakar parke muzika grojo per puse Vilniaus? Kažką praleidau?

answers.content: Čia tik roko koncertas Vingio parke. Nieko nepraleidai.  Tik tilto siūbavimą

posts.title: Asmeninis klausimas...
posts.question: O kur kabutės? Negi neskiriat backtiko nuo double-komos?
